name: Google Cloud Fundamentals: Getting Started with Cloud Marketplace
description: In this lab you use Cloud Marketplace to quickly and easily deploy a LAMP stack on a Compute Engine instance. The Bitnami LAMP Stack provides a complete web development environment for Linux that can be launched in one click.

steps.3: Task 1. Sign in to the Google Cloud Console
steps.4: Task 2. Use Cloud Marketplace to deploy a LAMP stack
